item.title: Administrative Management Specialist (Deputy Executive Officer) - 2 Positions
item.description:
USAID/DRC is seeking two Management Specialists to function as Deputy Executive Officers in the Mission's Executive Office. The incumbents will assist in overseeing delivery of effective personnel, administrative, logistical, and other support services for the Mission.

In this capacity, the Management Specialists will help to organize Executive Office work priorities and serve as an alter ego to the S/EXO as requested. The Management Specialists will review and preapprove designated actions for EXO attention, and assign and follow up on designated management operation tasks to ensure they are carried out properly and within appropriate time limits and customer service guidelines. Closing date and time: May 10, 2021, at 17:00 (Kinshasa Time). Learn more. 

Undefined
item.dc:creator: wwilliams

item.title: 72049721R10008: USAID Project Management Specialist (MCH), FSN-10
item.description:
The United States Government, represented by the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID), is seeking applications from qualified Indonesian Citizen to provide services as USAID Project Management Specialist (MCH), FSN-10 (Full Performance Level) under a Personal Services Contract, as described in the attached solicitation. The place of performance for this position will be in Jakarta, Indonesia.

English
